info.name: Internal ACP API
info.description:
This internal API is used to retreive data from ACP by Project ID. All inputs and returns are in the form of raw JSON (application/json). The variables need to run the API are in the `ACP_root` environment. 

Most inputs will require the following inputs: 
- token
- project_id

Some will require extra qualifiers, e.g., 'org_type' for `org_names_by_type` and 'project_detail' for `project_detail`

item.name: Authenticate

request.description:
Returns Accumulo token in JSON form.

Needs two inputs: 
- username
- password

item.description: Retreive a token from Accumulo based on username and password.

item.name: ACP requests

request.description:
Retrieves project profile detail. 

Needs three inputs 
- token
- project_id
- project_detail

Available `project_detail` qualifiers are:
- project_name
- project_impact
- project_state
- project_sector

Retrieves org names accoding to type. 

Needs three inputs 
- token
- project_id
- org_type

Available `org_type` qualifiers are:
 - supplier 
 - end_customer 
 - reseller
 - customs_clearing_agent 
 - carrier 
 - freight_forwarder
 - shipping_insurer

response.name: supplier

request.description:
Retrieves goods description for a specific project ID. 

Needs three inputs 
- token
- project_id

Given a project_id, returns the base price of the project in USD, net of reseller contributions.

Inputs 
- token
- project_id

Extracts payable invoice amounts from cash_flow_df and converts to US dollars, then sums them,
then subtracts reseller contribution from project_df. See get_base_price in finances.py

Returns JSON of the cash flow dates, amounts, and details for the project. Created for filling the "Milestones
Outflow/Inflow" section of the ACP.

Inputs 
- token
- project_id

request.description:
Returns contract numbers, po numbers, po amounts in USD, and goods item descriptions.


Inputs 
- token
- project_id

response.name: default project

request.description:
Returns the resellers' financial contribution to the project, in USD.

Inputs 
- token
- project_id

Returns a coverage ratio for a project. 


Inputs 
- token
- project_id

Given a project_id, returns the difference in days between the final end customer receivable and the first shipping/logistics payable.


Inputs 
- token
- project_id

Determines the date upon which the coverage ratio reduces to 1.0.

Inputs 
- token
- project_id

Return data from `get_acp_project_description_table`

Inputs 
- token
- project_id

Returns reseller IDs, end customer IDs, and the non-Kountable experience between the two.

 Inputs 
- token
- project_id

Returns incoterms, ports of loading and discharge, ground transport, final destination address, and warehouse location for each shipment of the project.


for the time being this is `supplier_pro_forma_invoice` based, but in the future it could be consignment based or shipper (`freight_forwarder/carrier`) pro_forma_invoice based
 Inputs 
- token
- project_id

item.description: A collection of endpoints used to retreive JSON from Accumulo database.
